video.title: The Adventures of Figaro Pho
video.synopsis: Imagine your worst fears, then multiply them: Figaro is a boy with any number of phobias and a highly quirky and imaginative way of dealing with them.

episodes.synopsis: A piranha is mistakenly delivered to Figaro's house; an accident turns Rivet back into a puppy; and Figaro has a rare moment of peace and quiet.
episodes.title: Fear of Fish (Ichthyophobia) / Fear of Being Alone (Isolophobia) / Fear of Boredom (Thaasophobia)

episodes.synopsis: Figaro is locked in a battle with his freeloading uncle; an odd creature enters Figaro's house; and a pesky mosquito disrupts Figaro's sleep.
episodes.title: Fear of Relatives (Syngenesophobia) / Fear of Rejection (Rejectiophobia) / Fear of Mosquitoes (Culicidaephobia)

episodes.synopsis: Figaro finds a prize in his cereal; a nasty odor invades Figaro's house; and Figaro's shower is on the blink, forcing him to put up with being dirty.
episodes.title: Fear of Thieves (Cleptophobia) / Fear of Foul Odours (Osmophobia) / Fear of Baths (Ablutophobia)

episodes.synopsis: Various baldness cures go wrong; Figaro panics when there's no food in the house; and the ice cream truck arrives, but the vendor is ... a clown!
episodes.title: Fear of Baldness (Phalacrophobia) / Fear of Hunger (Borborygamiphobia) / Fear of Clowns (Coulrophobia)

episodes.synopsis: Figaro finds a jar containing a shrunken head; the only thing coming between Figaro and Juliet is an elevator; and Figaro has skin problems.
episodes.title: Fear of Shrinking (Reducophobia) / Fear of Elevators (Elevatophobia) / Fear of Skin (Dermatopathophobia)

episodes.synopsis: A bat bite causes Figaro to undergo a transformation; cousin Leon arrives for a visit; and there's only room for one in the bomb shelter.
episodes.title: Fear of Becoming a Vampire (Transmutasanguivoriphobia) / Fear of a Rival (Antipalophobia) / Fear of Meteorites (Meteorophobia)

episodes.synopsis: Figaro confronts an endless array of terrors; Figaro buys a home bodybuilding system; and Figaro is terrified that he's aging rapidly.
episodes.title: Fear of Everything (Panophobia) / Fear of Being Weak (Asthenophobia) / Fear of Growing Old (Gerontophobia)

episodes.synopsis: Figaro's toilet fails, leaving him no choice but to find an alternative; Figaro finds a cloning machine; and Rivet tries to rid Figaro of his hiccups.
episodes.title: Fear of Unfamiliar Toilets (Novuslatrinaphobia) / Fear of Duplication (Clonophobia) / Fear of Hiccups (Myoclunusdiagphragmaphobia)

episodes.synopsis: Rivet suffers a malfunction; Figaro finds a portrait of hideous Aunt Agnes; and a beam of light transports Figaro inside a spaceship.
episodes.title: Fear of Mad Dogs (Deliricynophobia) / Fear of Being Ugly (Cacophobia) / Fear of Space Aliens (Astroxenophobia)

episodes.synopsis: A cactus swears revenge on Figaro for uprooting it; Figaro finds out he's allergic to flowers; and Figaro pretends to be a baby chick.
episodes.title: Fear of the Cactus (Kactosophobia) / Fear of Sneezing (Sternutaphobia) / Fear of Chickens (Alektorophobia)

episodes.synopsis: Figaro keeps buying pricey medicine from a crooked salesman; something mysterious lands on Figaro's doorstep; and Figaro can't relax at bedtime.
episodes.title: Fear of Disease (Pathophobia) / Fear of the Unknown Thing (Obscuraphobia) / Fear of What's Under the Bed (Sublectumphobia)

episodes.synopsis: Figaro is put to work; a creepy duck locks eyes with Figaro and won't look away; and Rivet turns out to be an extraordinary soccer player.
episodes.title: Fear of Work (Ergophobia) / Fear of Being Stared at by a Duck (Quackaphobia) / Fear of Losing (Kakorrhaphiophobia)

episodes.synopsis: Figaro keeps waking up in strange locations; Figaro refuses to use a shopping cart; and Figaro finds the hat of his great-uncle, who's a magician.
episodes.title: Fear of Sleepwalking (Somnambulaphobia) / Fear of Shopping Trolleys (Merxcarrucaphobia) / Fear of Dancing Rabbits (Choroleporophobia)
